thread.title: Thyroid drug off banned-substances list
thread.title_full: Thyroid drug off banned-substances list | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: Thyroid drug off banned-substances list
text: MONTREAL — Leaders at the World Anti-Doping Agency say there’s no scientific reason to ban thyroid medication, despite reports that some high-profile long-distance runners use the medicine during training. In the wake of reports that a number of athletes coached by Alberto Salazar use the medication, the British anti-doping agency and other asked WADA to consider putting it on its banned-substance list. But when the list came out last week, that medicine was not on it. Olivier Rabin, the science director at WADA, says that because the medicine stops the body from producing its own hormones once they reach a certain level, there’s no scientific reason to believe it enhances performance. — AP
